-- Create master key in databases with some password (one-off per database)
USE VAGNER;
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'TREINAMENTOSOLAR2022@!'
GO

--CRIAÇÃO DE CREDENTIAL
--Entrar no datalake e gerar chave SAS
USE VAGNER;
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SASADLSTRNSOLAR
 WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
--GERADO SECRET VIA SAS
 SECRET = 'sp=racwdlmeop&st=2022-09-21T15:41:11Z&se=2022-10-31T23:41:11Z&spr=https&sv=2021-06-08&sr=c&sig=ureeC3ItHE9Jiq6DiMGt8Z2CAPgv6IK6ZHM0XFRV054%3D'
 GO
